title: Simple, Healthy Meals in a Bowl
description: So many easy ways to combine healthy foods in one compact, delicious dish. Get recipes for some of our favorite meals in a bowl.
body: ​ Skip to content Allrecipes Search Please fill out this field. Search the site Please fill out this field. About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE 26 Simple, Healthy Meals in a Bowl By Carl Hanson Carl Hanson Carl Hanson is a Senior Editor at Allrecipes who has been writing about food and wine for nearly 20 years. He enjoys creating content that informs, entertains, and assists busy home cooks get nourishing meals on the table for their families. Allrecipes' editorial guidelines Updated on September 8, 2021 Close Credits: Buckwheat Queen Oh, it's a bowl'd move, alright! Loads of healthy foods, all combined in one compact, delicious dish. Pile 'em high with healthy veggies, kimchi, whole grains, fresh greens, noodles, lean meats, tofu, fresh herbs, and if you like, plop an egg on top! Eating right is easy with these simple and healthy dinner recipes. 01 of 27 Bibimbap (Korean Rice with Mixed Vegetables) View Recipe Save iYing "Bibimbap means 'mixed rice,' topped with vegetables, beef, a whole egg, and gochujang (red chili pepper paste)," says mykoreaneats. "You can substitute soy sauce or Sriracha for the chili paste." 02 of 27 Vermicelli Noodle Bowl View Recipe Save Dave Musumeci This simple and healthy Vietnamese noodle salad combines fresh herbs, rice vermicelli, cucumber, bean sprouts, topped with grilled shrimp, and tossed with a tangy sweet and sour sauce. 03 of 27 Asian Noodle Salad View Recipe Save lutzflcat "A beautiful and flavorful salad with a fresh ginger dressing," says Christine. "The cap of the shiitake mushroom is meaty with a lot of flavor; reserve the tough stems for stocks." 04 of 27 Vegetarian Banh Mi Bowls View Recipe Save fabeverydayblog "This brown rice-based vegetarian bowl version of the beloved Vietnamese banh mi sandwich gets its protein from quinoa and has a kick from a spicy vegetarian mayo sauce," says fabeverydayblog. 05 of 27 Garlic Chicken Fried Brown Rice View Recipe Save Fit&Healthy Mom "Leftover brown rice is reborn in this chicken fried rice with peppers and onions," says Joyce. 06 of 27 Tex-Mex Quinoa Salad View Recipe Save CookinBug This Tex-Mex-inspired salad is also great served in warm tortillas or taco shells. 07 of 27 Amazing Mexican Quinoa Salad View Recipe Save *Sherri* "Everything you need for a very healthy meal in one dish," says Rita. "Substitute barley for the brown rice and turtle beans for kidney beans if desired." 08 of 27 Black Bean Breakfast Bowl View Recipe Save Allrecipes Magazine "A quick breakfast if you're trying to avoid carbs," says Matt. 09 of 27 Korean Saewoo Bokkeumbap (Shrimp Fried Rice) View Recipe Save naples34102 "Enjoy this fried rice with kimchi and other Korean side dishes," says mykoreaneats. 10 of 27 Baja-Style Chicken Bowl View Recipe Save Linda T. "For a little extra flavor, add the salsa while cooking instead of after," says mlreffey. 11 of 27 Quinoa Bowl View Recipe Save Qhhunters "Simple dish that is very healthy, vegetarian, and can be a side or main course," says Robert. "Great as a lunch, too." 12 of 27 Bowl of Oatmeal Cookie View Recipe Save bd.weld "This spruced up bowl of oatmeal tastes more like an oatmeal cookie," says foodiewendy. "I make mine in the microwave for a quick and easy breakfast." 13 of 27 Quinoa and Black Beans View Recipe Save Dianne "A very flavorful alternative to black beans and rice," says 3LIONCUBS. 14 of 27 Nutty Brown Rice Salad View Recipe Save larkspur "This delicious cold rice salad has the great flavors of brown rice, fresh veggies, and chopped raw almonds," says Jacklyn. 15 of 27 Gyudon Japanese Beef Bowl View Recipe Save Buckwheat Queen "Having lived in Japan, this is a weekly staple in my house. My only changes are five teaspoons of soy sauce and three tablespoons of rice vinegar instead of Mirin," Jamie Lee says. 16 of 27 Spicy Tofu Salad Bowl View Recipe Save Buckwheat Queen "This is so simple and delicious. The topping makes the dish. I roasted the sesame seeds and used sesame seed oil to char extra firm tofu. I also added fresh sliced mango with the cucumbers!" — Thomas22 17 of 27 Low-Carb "Tacos" View Recipe Save Buckwheat Queen It doesn't matter if you eat this because you follow a low-carb diet or you are simply too lazy to make tortillas (who, me?). Just eat it! As the submitter writes, this does satisfy a craving, but she is humble. This is more than a settlement for tacos. This is a great dish." — Buckweat Queen 18 of 27 Deconstructed California Roll Bowl View Recipe Save Deconstructed California Roll Bowl. Linda T This California roll in a bowl features teriyaki chicken, vegetables, avocado, and short-grain rice. "I was craving a California roll one day, but since I'm not a big seafood fan I used chicken instead," says KAZOOT. "You could use crab or even shrimp if you are so inclined." 19 of 27 Do-It-Yourself Salmon Poke Bowls View Recipe Save A Day In the Kitchen "Easy to make in your own home! Buy your favorite toppings and enjoy a totally custom poke bowl for cheaper than buying it at a restaurant." — A Day In the Kitchen 20 of 27 Greek Chicken and Potato Bowl View Recipe Save Greek Chicken & Potato Bowl. Chef John Chef John revisits both his Big Fat Greek Salad recipe and his Greek chicken and potatoes recipe to create this bowl version that's the best of both worlds. 21 of 27 Mexican Turkey and Rice Bowl View Recipe Save Buckwheat Queen "This meal is so delicious! It's super simple to make and doesn't take long at all. Whip it up for a family dinner or your meal prep for the week," Leah Minnuci says. 22 of 27 Cauliflower Rice Bowl with Cilantro View Recipe Save Copycat Cauliflower Rice Bowl with Cilantro. thedailygourmet This simple bowl gets a quick kick-start with frozen riced cauliflower. It also features cans of black beans and corn and cooked shredded pork. You can sub in leftover chicken if you like. Top it off with salsa, crema con sal, and sliced avocado. "This copycat Chipotle® cauliflower bowl comes together fast on busy weeknights!" says thedailygourmet. "Toppings can be modified for taste preferences, and it's tasty wrapped up in a tortilla!" 23 of 27 Carrie's Pad Thai Salad View Recipe Save Erica Brown "This was very good! I recommend having all the ingredients prepped and ready before cooking. It comes together quick," Erica Brown says. 24 of 27 Salmon Quinoa Bowl View Recipe Save This simple recipe is ready in about 45 minutes. "Pan-seared salmon fillets and tahini-dressed chickpea kale salad come together in a colorful, nutrient-packed bowl with quinoa at its base," says TheOtherJuliaGulia. 25 of 27 Chirashi Bowl View Recipe Save Chirashi Bowl. Hayley "This home-style Japanese cooking is basically all of the ingredients for sushi mixed up in a bowl and served," says Benjamin Zuckerman. "It is a very fast and convenient way to enjoy the taste of sushi without all the work! I like to have cut-up pieces of seaweed to serve on the side, and a soy sauce-wasabi mixture is nice too. Good with tea, but better with beer." 26 of 27 Spicy Salmon Bowls over Brown Rice View Recipe Save Bibi "With salmon, brown rice, fresh crunchy vegetables, and a spicy sauce, this recipe is a delicious way to get some healthy foods in your family's diet," says Bibi, who submitted the recipe. "It will perk up their taste buds and bring you compliments." 27 of 27 More Like This Buckwheat Queen 17 Asian-Style Noodle Bowls to Warm You Up Our 20 Best Healthy Recipes Explore more: Recipes Main Dishes Bowls Was this page helpful? Thanks for your feedback! Tell us why! Other Submit You’ll Also Love Make-Ahead Sausage and Veggie Bowls 1 Rating Shrimp Grain Bowl 1 Rating Asian Steak and Noodle Bowl 19 Ratings Beef Teriyaki Noodle Bowl Elote Bowl with Grilled Pineapple 1 Rating Rice and Quinoa Breakfast Pudding 2 Ratings Naked Chicken Burrito Bowl 24 Ratings Grilled Teriyaki Tofu Bowls 2 Ratings Craving-Vietnamese Salad 3 Ratings Spicy Honey-Chipotle Salmon Bowl 1 Rating Sorghum, Quail Egg, Avocado, Kumato®and Buffalo Mozzarella Bowl 1 Rating Tuna and Vegetable Farro Bowl Asian Ground Beef Noodle Bowls 37 Ratings 22 Hearty One-Bowl Meals That Win Weeknight Dinners Lemon-Parmesan Chicken and Rice Bowl 77 Ratings Beef and Broccoli Noodle Bowl 5 Ratings Allrecipes Newsletters Follow Us Dinners Meals Ingredients Occasions Cuisines Kitchen Tips News Features About Us Editorial Process Privacy Policy Product Vetting Terms of Service Advertise Careers Contact Your Privacy Choices   Allrecipes is part of the Dotdash Meredith publishing family.
